channel.title: παγωτό on Το Χωριό Παλιό
channel.description: Recent content in παγωτό on Το Χωριό Παλιό

item.title: Παγωτό με γάλα, μέλι και αυγά
item.description: Table of Contents You only need 3 ingredients: Milk 450 ml. Sugar 125 g. Eggs 3 pcs. Vanillin 1 g and decoration as desired. Cooking order: Warm up 450 ml. milk is not to boil and remove from heat. Separate the whites from the yolks of 3 chicken eggs. Add a spoonful of sugar to the yolks. Pour one scoop of warm milk into the yolks and stir. Add 1 g of vanilla Pour contents into warm milk and stir.
